description:
Jian AnRan suffered a heart attack from a maddening book plot, and then he became the cannon fodder for the “beautiful love” of the scum Gong and his love rival in the book.

Jian AnRan decided to violently beat up the scum Gong and his love rival, step on them and irritate them to death!

As a result, he accidentally slept with his love rival’s uncle, Luo Wei! Jian AnRan took the chance to slip out of the room while Luo Wei was taking a shower.

Luo Wei appeared in front of him, blocking the door and hindering his escape, the same day he tried to run with his suitcase.

 Jian AnRan shrank: Your nephew told me to get lost and go back to my hometown…

If he asks you to go back, you go back?! The man looked down at the teenager’s face that had ‘full of unwillingness’ written all over it.

The cold eyes had a vague tenderness: From now on, I am your home!

Luo Wei has been cold and heartless for more than 30 years. The only tenderness in his life, was given all to Jian AnRan after that night.

The vengeful cannon fodder shou attacked by the ruthless pampering wife gong.>
